...some research may show that his lover of the time when good old Barney was busy defeating McCain's et al efforts to reform Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac worked for Fannie Mae.
 
 
 ...and guess what he was doing. He was developing their plan for sub-prime mortgages.
 
 
 It is no wonder Barney was in favor of letting the cash cow continue to pump dollars into his cronies pockets. His lover was part of the action. I think old Barney himself got some $40,000 out of Fannie Mae...free money...to him...
 
 I do wonder why the MSM has been silent about this. I also wonder if it had been Sarah Palin and a lover in a similar scenario if we'd see anything else on the front page.
